version_description:
Thank you for using istanbulkart application.
With this update;
1 - You can add more than one istanbulkart and create instructions for these cards.
2 - You can do more updates on profile page.
3 - You can send the transaction details to the e-mail address you want.
4 - Arrangements and performance improvements were made according to your demands.

version_description:
What's New in This Version Describe what's new in this version of your app, such as new features, improvements, and bug fixes.
Thank you for using istanbulkart application.
With this update;
1 - You can use credit cards of contracted banks.
2 - You can add more than one istanbulkart and create instructions for these cards.
3 - You can do more updates on profile page.
4 - Arrangements and performance improvements were made according to your demands.
5 - Increased number of valid bank cards.
